subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After feeling two pops in his weakened left Achilles’ tendon on Thursday, Cliff Floyd was reduced, at least temporarily, to the role of pinch-hitter for the N.L.C.S.
snippet: After feeling two pops in his weakened left Achilles’ tendon on Thursday, Cliff Floyd was reduced, at least temporarily, to the role of pinch-hitter for the N.L.C.S.
